summary: AIR BAG LIGHT WAS ON.  SERVICED AT DEALER 4 TIMES AND PROBLEM WAS STILL ON GOING.   THEY FOUND CODES, PASSENGER SIDE AIR BAG DEPLOYMENT LOOP OPEN, AND VOLTAGE OUT OF RANGE.  AIR BAG MODULE  REPLACED.   AFTER SEVERAL MONTHS, AT START UP,  SPEEDOMETER,  GAS GAUGE AND DASH LIGHTS FAILED.  VEHICLE RESTARTED AND THAT'S WHEN THE  AIRBAG LIGHT CAME BACK ON.  DEALER UPDATED INSTRUMENT PANEL CLUSTER. SOP IN AIR BAG, PANEL MODULE GOING OPEN, REPLACED PASSENGER INSTRUMENT PANEL MODULE. WAS OK FOR ONE WEEK. HAD INTERMITTENT AIR BAG LIGHT COME ON AGAIN.  HAVE NOT RECONTACTED DEALER.    *TT
